meanings.definition: Reach a climax or point of highest development.
meanings.sent1: The excitement culmina when the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent2: The concert culmina with a spectacular fireworks display.
meanings.sent3: The chef's culinary skills culmina in a dish that tastes like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work culmina in a well-deserved promotion.
meanings.sent5: The journey culmina in a breathtaking view from the mountain top.

meanings.sent1: The culmina of the mountain offers a stunning view of the valley below.
meanings.sent2: The culmina of her career was winning the prestigious award.
meanings.sent3: The culmina of the movie was the unexpected plot twist at the end.
meanings.sent4: The culmina of the performance was the singer hitting a high note flawlessly.
meanings.sent5: The culmina of the party was when everyone joined in for a group dance.
